mapper.insert:

work_order_no,
receive_mobile,
content,
send_time,
send_status,

sms_source,

#{workOrderNo},
#{receiveMobile},
#{content},
#{sendTime},
#{sendStatus},

insert into
(
work_order_no ,
receive_mobile ,
content ,
send_time ,
send_status ,
sms_type ,
sms_source ,
send_priority ,
admin_id ,
service_back_info ,
send_fail_count ,
group_send_id ,
sms_sign ,
update_time ,
create_time ) values
(
#{item.workOrderNo} ,
#{item.receiveMobile} ,
#{item.content} ,
#{item.sendTime} ,
#{item.sendStatus} ,
#{item.smsType} ,
#{item.smsSource} ,
#{item.sendPriority} ,
#{item.adminId} ,
#{item.serviceBackInfo} ,
#{item.sendFailCount} ,
#{item.groupSendId} ,
#{item.smsSign} ,
#{item.updateTime} ,
#{item.createTime} )
mapper.update:
update
recent_record_id=#{recentRecordId},
work_order_no=#{workOrderNo},
receive_mobile=#{receiveMobile},
content=#{content},
send_time=#{sendTime},
send_status=#{sendStatus},
sms_type=#{smsType},
sms_source=#{smsSource},
send_priority=#{sendPriority},
admin_id=#{adminId},
service_back_info=#{serviceBackInfo},
send_fail_count=#{sendFailCount},
group_send_id=#{groupSendId},
sms_sign=#{smsSign},
update_time=#{updateTime},
create_time=#{createTime},
where recent_record_id=#{recentRecordId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM
WHERE send_time
<
DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
